mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notice ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (title, content, created_at, updated_at, is_active, start_at, end_at, author_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW(), 1, #{startAt}, #{endAt}, 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated_at = #{updatedAt}, is_active = #{isActive}, start_at = #{startAt}, end_at = #{endAt}, author_id = #{authorId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notice WHERE is_active = TRUE AND (start_at IS NULL OR start_at <= NOW()) AND (end_at IS NULL OR end_at >= NOW()) ORDER BY created_at DESC
